title: Firefox Not Responding
content:
Hi

I have tried to launch Firefox a number of times today and every time it has frozen and does not respond. When trying to select the option of opening the software in Troubleshoot mode, once again the software freezes and I am unable to open the software in Troubleshoot mode . I have tried shutting and re-opening both the software and my laptop but this does not resolve the issue. Can you please either resolve the issue of the software freezing or tell me how I can resolve the issue.

title: recently closed tabs
content:
Good day,

I noticed that the "recently closed tabs" hustory remains available even after quitting firefox, when quitting should erase history.

This is counterintuitive. I would like quitting to clear also the recently closed tabs.

Would you like to consider this for the next version update?

Thank you for your work. I appreciate what you do a lot!

Best regards

title: High CPU and RAM usage with Firefox during video playback
content:
Hello Community,

I have been experiencing significant issues with Firefox for the past couple of months. The main concern is high CPU and RAM consumption during video playback, especially on YouTube.

This issue started appearing only for the past month or two; it was never present before on the same system, and no significant hardware changes have been made.

Crucially, this problem is exclusive to Firefox. I have tested video playback on other browsers such as Google Chrome, Brave, and Microsoft Edge, and do not face any similar performance issues with them.

Your assistance in resolving this is greatly appreciated.

Thank you.
creator: ronakdangi74

title: Recover Lost Bitcoin After Investment Fraud With Grayware Tech Services
content:
Recover Your Lost Cryptocurrency with Grayware Tech Services Trusted Experts in Cryptocurrency Recovery

Lost access to your crypto? Scammed, hacked, or locked out of your wallet? You’re not alone — and you’re not out of options.

Grayware Tech Services is a leading name in cryptocurrency recovery, helping individuals and businesses recover lost digital assets when all hope seems gone. With years of hands-on experience and a proven success record, we specialize in turning impossible cases into successful recoveries.

Why Choose Grayware Tech Services? ✅ Proven Crypto Recovery Experience

For years, Grayware Tech Services has helped clients recover Bitcoin, Ethereum, and other major cryptocurrencies lost to scams, fraud, forgotten credentials, and technical failures.

✅ Advanced Blockchain & Digital Forensics

Our experts use cutting-edge blockchain tracing, cybersecurity tools, and digital forensic analysis to track lost assets and identify viable recovery paths.

✅ Help When Others Say “Impossible”

Many of our clients come to us after being told their crypto is unrecoverable. Our specialized approach allows us to succeed where others fail.

✅ Ethical, Transparent & Confidential

We believe trust is everything. You’ll receive honest case evaluations, clear communication, and strict confidentiality from start to finish.

Our Cryptocurrency Recovery Services

Crypto scam and fraud recovery

Hacked wallet recovery

Lost private key and wallet access solutions

Blockchain transaction tracing

Digital asset investigation

Each case is carefully reviewed to determine the best recovery strategy — no false promises, just real expertise.

A Trusted Name in Crypto Asset Recovery

The crypto world is complex, and recovery requires deep technical knowledge. Grayware Tech Services has built its reputation by staying ahead of evolving blockchain technologies and emerging threats.

Our mission is simple: help clients reclaim what is rightfully theirs.

Don’t Give Up on Your Crypto

Losing cryptocurrency can be stressful and overwhelming — but it doesn’t have to be permanent. Grayware Tech Services has helped countless individuals recover assets they thought were gone forever.

Take the first step toward recovery today.

Contact Grayware Tech Services now on https : // graywaretechservice . com for a confidential case evaluation and find out how we can help you recover your cryptocurrency.
